inspiracio.atom
Interface AtomSAO<T extends AtomBean>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAtomSAO
public interface AtomSAO<T extends AtomBean>

A SAO that we want to use for Atom must implement this interface. It specifies the ReST operations and translation between beans and entries.

Author:
BARCELONA\alexanderb

Method Detail

insert

T insert(GDataURL url,
         T bean,
         String slug)
                          throws HttpException,
                                 BadRequestException,
                                 NotAuthorizedException,
                                 ForbiddenException
Create a new bean.

Parameters:
url - The URL that has received the insertion request.
bean - The bean to be inserted.
slug - The client wants something similar to this String appear in the id.
Returns:
The entry as inserted. Usually, the id will have been changed.
Throws:
BadRequestException - Some invalid parameter has been passed
NotAuthorizedException - The SAO requires the client to be authenticated, but the client has not provided username and password.
ForbiddenException - The SAO requires the client to be authenticated, but the username and password provided by the client could not be validated by the SAO.
PreconditionFailedException - ETag is not current.
HttpException - Look at status (=subclass) and message for more information.

update

T update(T bean)
                          throws PreconditionFailedException,
                                 HttpException
Edit a bean.

Parameters:
bean - The bean as edited by the client. The id obviously cannot be changed.
Throws:
BadRequestException - Some invalid parameter has been passed
NotAuthorizedException - The SAO requires the client to be authenticated, but the client has not provided username and password.
ForbiddenException - The SAO requires the client to be authenticated, but the username and password provided by the client could not be validated by the SAO.
PreconditionFailedException - Client has not sent up-to-date ETag.
HttpException - Look at status (=subclass) and message for more information.

getFeed

Feed getFeed(GDataURL url)
             throws HttpException,
                    InternalServerErrorException
Get a feed containing some beans.

This method returns a feed, and not just a collection of beans or entries, because the SAO may want to set the fields of the feed too, and may want to add some extension elements to the feed. SAOs that are not interested in setting fields in the feed can extend AbstractAtomSAO, and overwrite just get, and not getFeed.

Parameters:
url - The URL of the request, in a form that parses the Atom parameters easily.
Returns:
The feed that should be sent to the client.
Throws:
BadRequestException - Some invalid parameter has been passed
NotAuthorizedException - The SAO requires the client to be authenticated, but the client has not provided username and password.
ForbiddenException - The SAO requires the client to be authenticated, but the username and password provided by the client could not be validated by the SAO.
InternalServerErrorException - The SAO signals that something has gone wrong in processing the request and that the servlet should reply 500 Internal Server Error to the client.
HttpException

delete

void delete(String id,
            String etag)
            throws PreconditionFailedException,
                   HttpException
Remove a bean from the store.

Parameters:
id - The id of the bean to be removed.
etag - Must be current, else PreconditionFailedException
Throws:
BadRequestException - Some invalid parameter has been passed
NotAuthorizedException - The SAO requires the client to be authenticated, but the client has not provided username and password.
ForbiddenException - The SAO requires the client to be authenticated, but the username and password provided by the client could not be validated by the SAO.
PreconditionFailedException - Client has not sent current etag.
HttpException
